title: KitchedAid 5 (more then 20 color variants, capacity 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in single batch, 59 touch points planetary mixing, includes: Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, Pouring Shield)
descriptions:
Introducing the KitchedAid 5, a versatile and durable kitchen appliance designed to elevate your baking and cooking experience. With more than 20 color variants available, you can choose the one that best suits your style and kitchen decor.

The KitchedAid 5 boasts an impressive capacity, capable of handling 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in a single batch. The 59 touch points planetary mixing action ensures thorough and even mixing, making it perfect for various recipes.

This stand mixer comes with a 5-quart stainless steel bowl that features a comfortable handle for easy maneuvering and is dishwasher-safe for hassle-free cleaning. The bowl is accompanied by a set of included accessories: a coated flat beater, coated dough hook, 6-wire whip, and pouring shield, all designed to enhance your culinary creations.

The KitchedAid 5 is built with durable metal construction, ensuring longevity and reliability. Its tilt-head design provides easy access to the bowl and attachments, while the 10-speed settings allow you to achieve the desired consistency for your recipes.

But that's not all! The KitchedAid 5 also offers more than 10 optional hub-powered attachments (sold separately) to expand its functionality, making it a versatile addition to your kitchen arsenal.

Upgrade your cooking and baking game with the KitchedAid 5 - the ultimate kitchen assistant that combines style, performance, and versatility in one powerful package.
